016
017package com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.bungee.sender;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.sender.Sender;
020import com.github.siroshun09.mccommand.common.sender.ConsoleSender;
021import net.md_5.bungee.api.CommandSender;
022import net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.TextComponent;
023import net.md_5.bungee.api.connection.ProxiedPlayer;
024import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
025
026import java.util.Objects;
027import java.util.UUID;
028
029/**
030 * A class that wraps {@link CommandSender}.
031 */
032public class BungeeSender implements Sender {
033
034    private final CommandSender sender;
035
036    /**
037     * Create {@link Sender} to use in the library with a {@link CommandSender}.
038     *
039     * @param sender {@link CommandSender} to wrap
040     */
041    public BungeeSender(@NotNull CommandSender sender) {
042        this.sender = sender;
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * {@inheritDoc}
047     */
048    @Override
049    @NotNull
050    public UUID getUUID() {
051        if (sender instanceof ProxiedPlayer) {
052            return ((ProxiedPlayer) sender).getUniqueId();
053        } else {
054            return ConsoleSender.CONSOLE_UUID;
055        }
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * {@inheritDoc}
060     */
061    @Override
062    @NotNull
063    public String getName() {
064        return sender.getName();
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * {@inheritDoc}
069     */
070    @Override
071    public void sendMessage(@NotNull String message) {
072        sender.sendMessage(TextComponent.fromLegacyText(message));
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * {@inheritDoc}
077     */
078    @Override
079    public boolean hasPermission(@NotNull String perm) {
080        return sender.hasPermission(perm);
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * {@inheritDoc}
085     */
086    @Override
087    public boolean isOnline() {
088        if (sender instanceof ProxiedPlayer) {
089            return ((ProxiedPlayer) sender).isConnected();
090        } else {
091            return true;
092        }
093    }
094
095    @Override
096    public int hashCode() {
097        return Objects.hash(sender);
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    public boolean equals(Object o) {
102        if (this == o) {
103            return true;
104        }
105
106        if (o instanceof BungeeSender) {
107            BungeeSender that = (BungeeSender) o;
108            return sender.equals(that.sender);
109        } else {
110            return false;
111        }
112    }
113}
